effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 970,276 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 531,747.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.
